isis.stitle: 10 SPEED TRANSMISSIONS FULLER RT-610 SERIES - INSTALL - LEFT REVERSE IDLER GEAR

step1.para: Install the reverse idler gear front washer on the pin in the upper left of the case ( Figure 166).

figure.caption: Figure 166. Install Reverse Idler Gear Front Washer

step1.para: Install the needle bearing in the hub of the reverse idler gear ( Figure 167).

figure.caption: Figure 167. Install Needle Bearing in Hub of Reverse Idler Gear

step1.para: Set the reverse idler gear in position, machined surface of the gear hub to the rear ( Figure 168).

figure.caption: Figure 168. Set Reverse Idler Gear in Position

step1.para: Place the rear washer in the holder if previously removed, oil slot down, and bend the lugs to secure the washer.
Place the washer and holder into reverse gear case bore, oil slots toward the gear, holder flange to the rear ( Figure 169).

figure.caption: Figure 169. Place Washer and Holder into Reverse Gear Case Bore

step1.para: Install the auxiliary countershaft front bearing into the reverse gear case bore to hold the reverse idler gear assembly in position ( Figure 170).

figure.caption: Figure 170. Install Auxiliary Countershaft Front Bearing into Reverse Gear Case Bore

note.para: The front portion of the auxiliary countershaft is used as a journal for the reverse idler gear.
